para1: Welcome to U-0CA0, a remote planet where you have just crash-landed during your space expedition. You and your friend will need to adapt to all the unique properties of your new "home" in order to escape this planet.
para2: As you start to comprehend the situation, you realize that your suits are damaged: you can't jump! Fortunately, you can still jump if your friend shoots you with his electromagnetic gun. However, this is a double-edged sword, as each jump will cost you some health.
para3: Take a breath and focus, your journey will not be an easy ride!
